channel.title: [PI] Help outofbounds
channel.description:
I get this error whenever I teleport to godwars! I tried adding the godwars killcount interface and this happens..
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -28141 at client.method119(client.java:9786) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:9436) at client.method146(client.java:12519) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8596) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9377) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5017) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
http://google.com/runescape-development/google/tutorials/344329-pi-real-godwars-interface-kc-pi.html <--- I followed that tutorial (change google to rune-server.org)

item.title: [PI] Help outofbounds
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

I get this error whenever I teleport to godwars! I tried adding the godwars killcount interface and this happens…
